mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, u.name, b.hit, date_format(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regDate, u.no userNo FROM tboard b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no order by no asc

SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, u.name, b.hit, date_format(b.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regDate, u.no userNo FROM tboard b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no order by no asc limit #{startRowNo},#{listCount}

select count(*) count from tboard b
where ( b.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
